meanings.definition: A member of a military police force, especially in Italy or Spain.
meanings.sent1: The carabinero helped direct traffic during the parade.
meanings.sent2: I saw a carabinero patrolling the streets in Rome.
meanings.sent3: The carabinero tried to give a parking ticket to a stray cat.
meanings.sent4: The carabinero stood tall like a guardian of the city.
meanings.sent5: The bright uniform of the carabinero made them easy to spot in the crowd.

meanings.definition: A type of shrimp commonly found in Mediterranean cuisine.
meanings.sent1: The restaurant served a delicious dish with carabineros.
meanings.sent2: I love the taste of carabinero in paella.
meanings.sent3: The carabinero shrimp danced in the sizzling pan.
meanings.sent4: The carabinero added a burst of flavor to the seafood platter.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant red color of the carabinero made it stand out on the plate.
